text: Hey folks! For the ones who participated in the Themes Challenge and are part of the winners, did you have any updates from HubSpot about the promotion of the winners themes that was mentioned in the prizes? <@U2H3TT8F2> any info? There has been little communication since the challenge ended and the winners announcement :relieved:
Hi Emeline, let me loop in with some folks internally and see what i can find out.
Following up, you can reach out to <mailto:developers@HubSpot.com|developers@HubSpot.com> and they can provide further clarification for you on this :slightly_smiling_face:
